name: preconsciousness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the level of awareness (= knowledge that something exists, or understanding of a situation or subject at the present time) in which information can be recalled (= brought back into your mind) if necessary: This represents the desire to return to the womb, and to the bliss of preconsciousness. Pre-consciousness deals with cognitive operations that take place at any given moment outside awareness.
More examplesFewer examplesAlthough part of our historical pre-consciousness still takes democracy for granted, we also know that neo-liberalism has changed things.The problem of insomnia is characterized as being painfully conscious of lapses into preconsciousness.
